about_the_game:
Game description:

《Power Punch》 is a VR multiplayer competitive game that combines sports rehabilitation and entertainment! In this exciting virtual boxing world, you can not only experience the intense boxing duel, but also have a full-body workout through the game to enhance your physical fitness and improve your health.
Simple operation, no matter you are a novice or veteran player of VR games, you can quickly get started and feel the fun of boxing. In the game, your task is to blast your opponent out of the ring through strategy and skill. Every punch is not only a challenge to your opponent, but also a workout for your physical ability.


The game style is funny and humorous, with several exaggerated expressions, head tilted, spasm, face twisted... etc., will let you in the intense and exciting boxing duel, but also can feel the relaxed and happy atmosphere, so that the game is full of joy and fun. In addition to the basic sparring mode, there are also diverse combat scenarios, the game's help players to improve boxing skills at the same time, to achieve the effect of exercise. Whether in exciting matches or in daily fitness training, you will feel the full commitment and sense of accomplishment.

By the way, " the uppercut " can hit the opponent higher and farther - Let's punch hard!


Features:

  • Fitness combined with entertainment: play the game and achieve the purpose of physical exercise at the same time.
  • Easy to learn: Both novice and experienced players can quickly get into the fight.
  • Whole Body Exercise: Every swing is a physical challenge.
  • Various training: Rich training modules to meet different fitness needs.
  • Fun Interaction: Humorous game style and exaggerated expressions add fun.


《Power Punch》 is not only an exciting boxing duel, but also a comprehensive physical training. Join us now to make exercise more fun and make health your new goal in the game! Reliable test data proves that sticking to 15 minutes a day can improve your physical fitness by almost 30%.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX480 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR / OpenXR / Oculus / PICO
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for standing and open spaces.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX5700 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR / OpenXR / Oculus / PICO
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for standing and open spaces.
